body:
Halfling Homeland
d%Result
01—50Halfling Settlement: You gain access to the Civilized social trait and the Well-Informed race trait.
51—80Human Settlement: You gain access to the Child of the Streets social trait and the Well-Informed race trait.
81—95Traveling Band or Caravan: You gain access to the Friend in Every Town social trait.
96—100Unusual Homeland: Roll on the Unusual Homeland table.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 1-Homeland/Family/and Childhood/Halfling/Halfling Homeland
name: Halfling Homeland
